# HVPDB Migrate Plugin

Schema migration and data versioning tools for **HVPDB**.

This is an official plugin for [HVPDB (High Velocity Python Database)](https://github.com/8w6s/hvpdb).

## Installation

```bash
pip install hvpdb-migrate
```

## Usage

```bash
# Run migration CLI
hvpdb-migrate upgrade ./mydb.hvp
```
